actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to reauthorize the Advisory Council to Support Grandparents Raising Grandchildren for an additional 4 years, and for other purposes.
short_title: Supporting the Well-Being and Mental Health of Grandfamilies Act

summary.text:
Supporting the Well-Being and Mental Health of Grandfamilies Act

This bill extends the Advisory Council to Support Grandparents Raising Grandchildren for four additional years and limits the number of nonfederal members serving on the council to 10.

titles.title: Supporting the Well-Being and Mental Health of Grandfamilies Act
